course.subject: LANG
course.name: Technical Communication II for IEDA and ISDN
course.description: A one-term, major-specific language course for students in IEDA and ISDN. The course focuses on Final Year Project report writing and presentations and appropriate communication strategies and language use in professional contexts relevant to the disciplines. For IEDA and ISDN students in their third or fourth year of study only.
course.prerequisites: (For DDP only) CORE 1403 OR CORE 1404 OR LANG 1003 (prior to 2022-23); (For all others) LANG 2030

reviews.author: Mason Mount
reviews.comment_content:
Part 1: Communication in IEDA/ISD Projects
Written Assessment 1: An introduction and literature review of an academic research reportÔºèReview of an IEDA/ISD topic
Spoken Assessment 1: Poster presentation without using a poster

Part 2: Communication in Professional Contexts
Written Assessment 2: White Paper (Individual)
Spoken Assessment 2: A presentation on industry trends (Individual)
